bytes.

## base64_encode

[[find in source code]](..\..\..\..\..\env\Lib\site-packages\itsdangerous\encoding.py#L15)

```python
def base64_encode(string):
```

Base64 encode a string of bytes or text. The resulting bytes are
safe to use in URLs.
